SQL column info

Source: R/info.R
ps_column_info.Rd

SQL column info

ps_column_info(table_name, conn = getOption("ps.conn"))

Arguments

table_name

A string of the name of the table.
conn

An SQLiteConnection object.

Value

A data frame with the name of the column and the type.
